attributes.action: Withdraw funding for the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC funds the Eurovision Song Contest, to the tune of £173,000, which allows the UK entry to bypass the semi-final stage of the competition. With voting now being a "joke", why should the UK fund something that we could never win.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
